comment._content: Other Bain/LOC photos of the IMPERATOR in New York harbor: www.flickr.com/search/?w=8623220@N02&q=imperator&...

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of August 29, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9C04E6DC113CE633A... indicates that the day before (August 28, 1913 as on the negative), there had been a fire in s storeroom and a young officer was killed

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Swanq: Thanks.  We'll add the date next time we update the record.

comment.author: 99217767@N00
comment._content:
I was going to comment that back in the day, apparently fire was smokeless and the firefighters wore suits.  But it appears this photographer came early to the fire.  I guess its better than being late...

Love the old photos!
